servinfo.title: EVAP Canister Inspection

attention1.ptxt: Do not suck nozzles on EVAP canister.
Fuel vapor inside EVAP canister is harmful.

servinfo.ptxt: If faulty condition is found, replace EVAP canister.

item.ptxt: Check outside of EVAP canister for cracks and damage.
Check that there is no restriction of flow through tank pipe (3) when air is blown into air pipe (2) and purge pipe (1) blocked with finger.
Check that there is no restriction of flow through purge pipe (1) when air is blown into air pipe (2) and tank pipe (3) with finger.
